summary: THE CAR DID THE SAME THING THIS MORNING, 7/14/2017, SLIPPED OUT OF GEAR ON THE DOWN GRADE IN LOW.   I JUST FILED A REPORTED  OF 2 OTHER INSTANCES OVER THE PAST 2 MONTHS OF THE SAME NATURE YESTERDAY 7/13/2017.   I ALSO REPORTED TO OUR LOCAL FORD AGENCY THIS MORNING ( AUTONATION FORD IN TORRENCE, CA).   IT WAS SUGGESTED THAT THE NEXT TIME THIS HAPPENS HAVE IT TOWED IN AND LET THEM CHECK THE COMPUTER.
